prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon with a blue body and white accents.
I want a mythical creature that floats in the air with mesmerizing colors.
Generate a unique Pokemon inspired by ancient legends, featuring blue and white colors.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of dreams and has an ethereal appearance.
Imagine a mystical being with a serene demeanor and an elegant design.
Design a Pokemon that represents the power of the mind, showcasing intricate details.
Show me a legendary Pokemon with a whimsical look, perfect for a fantasy setting.
